IntroductionToJaneStart: ^Sir’s already here! Come quick before he checks our attendance.

b: ^Jane, be seated quick. It's gonna be a rough day today.
^It's really a matter of time until someone fails the subject.
^Rigen was a girl in the Maybog doing alright, but she became a princess in Gabas.
^Now she's gotta figure out howto do it right, so much to fuck and see
^Up the DCST with my family, in a store that's just for honesty.
^I hope things turn out for the better. This really isn't a good sign... Rigen love Maniego

JaneSeated: ^Did something happen? It seems that something’s wrong in the air.
^Apparently, sir isn’t really in the mood. He wasn’t too happy with the performance of our latest laboratory.

c-0: ^I don't know but I feel like we messed up big time.
c-1: ^Guessing from the overall mood, I think so.

HeinrichDisappoint: ^I have recently checked your latest laboratory exercise, and honestly I haven’t been the most disappointed in my life.
^I’ve designed it to be difficult to understand, but easy to solve.
^I’ve added all those additional information to confuse you, but only a few managed to find the right answer.
^You’re already in your third year, a year closer to graduation - that is if you can do so on time.
^Please be reminded that your occupation and the world does not spoonfeed you the answers.
^With the evergrowing busy society, thousands of irrelevant information bombard you.
^Navigating even the simplest answers are made challenging. How can you really tell that you’re ready for the industry if you fail to recognise a simple task?
PipesBlurtComment: ^He’s definitely not on a good mood.
HeinrichSideEye: ^I expect you here to be the cream of the crop once you finish this subject, and I will not allow any student to pass this subject completely unprepared.
HeinrichAnger: ^Good. Let me remind everyone that our finals week is approaching.
^The latest laboratory exercise has affected most of you, so this term exam will dictate whether you pass or fail this course.
^The passing rate will remain the same, and there will be no removal exams.
^To prove that a student is worthy of passing my subject in a single test despite having the entire semester to do so is utterly ridiculous.
ChristopherSideComment: ^I’ve never seen him this angry. Was our performance really that bad?
JaneCommentResponse: ^I think I messed the entire thing up.
^I think I did too. Not to mention that its weight is higher than the other laboratories. We’re all doomed.
HeinrichRemarks: ^This is your final chance to redeem yourselves. Please don’t disappoint me any further.
LaiQuestion: ^But, sir. How about the discussion? I think we still have some chapters left in our module that are included in the coverage.
^Do we have to do independent study or d-
^A lecture session will be conducted later this 4 in the afternoon. In the meantime, use the remaining time to reflect on your recent performance.
^Don’t forget to submit your attendance slips at the table in front. Please form in line, as well. I will be returning your Laboratory Exercises shortly.

b: ^Guys, I think I’m gonna cry. I really feel like I failed the exercise.
^Jane, trust me. There’s only one way to find out~
^Pipes, the girl is about to cry! Don’t make it worse.
^I’M NOT! I’m just trying to lighten the mood, that’s all.
^Hey, hey. I’m sorry. What matters is that you tried your best, and if things comes to worse, which I hope things wont, we still have the final term exam.
^Yeah, we can still pass this horrid subject. Let’s fall in line and meet our inevitable fate. I wanna get out of this room as quickly as possible.
^Disappointed, but not surprised... Claim your paper.
